article.author: Cunard
article.title: Alaska, by Cunard.
article.lead: Breathtaking scenic voyages, immersive Alaska experiences and unforgettable Cunard style.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/p1l7BXDZ3vM?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Gran Meliá Iguazú
article.title: The Gran Meliá Iguazú: Connect with Nature in Elegance
article.lead: The Gran Meliá Iguazú is the only hotel within Iguazú National Park, offering relaxed elegance and luxury. Enjoy one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Iguazu Falls, from a privileged location.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Jpv_XzryihQ?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Rocky Mountaineer
article.title: Rocky Mountaineer Experience
article.lead: Transporting guests through the grandeur of the Canadian Rockies, our custom design glass-dome trains offer breathtaking landscapes, outstanding service, gourmet food and passionate hosts with stories to tell.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aGOJxIbFzCs?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Seabourn
article.title: Seabourn All-Inclusive Differences
article.lead: This video illustrates why Seabourn is the world’s finest all-inclusive ultra-luxury resort at sea.
